title: Tool Location Display
description: As a user, I want to see the approximate location of a tool on a map so that I can determine if it's convenient to borrow
acceptanceCriteria: AC01: Given a tool's detail page, when loaded, then a map should be displayed showing the approximate tool location
AC02: Given a tool owner's postcode, when displaying location, then only the approximate area should be shown for privacy
AC03: Given a map display, when viewing on mobile, then the map should be properly sized and interactive
AC04: Given an invalid postcode, when displaying location, then an appropriate error message should be shown
AC05: Given a tool location, when displaying the map, then an appropriate zoom level should be set to show the neighborhood area
